text: Michael Chilufya Sata (6 July 1937 â€“ 28 October 2014) was a Zambian politician. He was the fifth President of Zambia. He served as president from 23 September 2011 until his death on 28 October 2014. Sata died in London, England, aged 77 on 28 October 2014."Zambian President Michael Sata dies in London", BBC News - Africa, 29 October 2014. ==References== Category:1937 births Category:2014 deaths Category:Disease-related deaths in England Category:Presidents of Zambia
title: Michael Sata
